text: Tom Hector W. Whiteley (born 17 December 1995) is an English rugby union scrum-half for Saracens in Premiership Rugby. ==Career== Whiteley began playing rugby for Rosslyn Park's junior sides age 7, he went to Millfield School and played full back in academy sides for Bristol and Harlequins but was considered too small and released. He switched to scrum-half and after impressing at the Rosslyn Park 7s tournament signed a professional contract with Saracens. After spending time on loan in the national leagues Whiteley made his first start for Saracens on 13 April 2019, scoring a try in a 23-21 defeat to Bristol Bears. ==References== Category:English rugby union players Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Saracens F.C. players Category:Rugby union scrum-halves
title: Tom Whiteley
